remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果发生以下情况之一，则此方法返回支持指定的控件模式的对象。If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns an object that supports the specified control pattern. - `patternInterface` 等于并相关联这具有子对象。`patternInterface` equals and the that is associated with this has child objects. - `patternInterface` 等于并相关联这不具有子对象。`patternInterface` equals and the that is associated with this does not have child objects. - `patternInterface` 等于并关联与此其可选中的属性设置为`true`。`patternInterface` equals and the that is associated with this has its checkable property set to `true`. - `patternInterface` 等于并相关联这可以调整大小。`patternInterface` equals and the that is associated with this can be resized.
